channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Noisy and loose sunken manhole cover at the traffic lights junction of Parton Road, Cheltenham Road East and Innsworth Lane, 10th January
item.description:
Very noisy loose and sunken manhole cover for around a month at the Hare and Hounds traffic lights junction, Churchdown, Gloucester
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Devereaux Court Innsworth Lane, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, 9th January
item.description:
Pothole which is deep and getting larger on the road in the usual path of wheels.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Porchester Road, Hucclecote

item.title: Replacement Tree, 9th January
item.description:
Thankyou for removing the tree sadly brought down in the recent storm, and please can we have a replacement tree as we all need trees for the environment.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Rowanfield Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Bin needs to be emptied, 9th January
item.description:
Bin is full and has fallen down

item.title: Tree is broken at base and is in danger of falling into road, 9th January
item.description:
This tree is leaning into the road. It is broken at the base and is in danger of falling into the road. It is only being held up by clinging ivy and saplings

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Trails End Stantons Drive, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Savils sold board, 9th January
item.description:
Estate Agents sold board on main road displayed at 81 Andover Road which is not the property it relates or within the curtilage of the property marketed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 81 Andover Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown hedgerow Finley way making path narrowAlso over grown ar Evesham road.danger of hitting some one in the eye., 8th January
item.description:
The Finley way was reported months ago.people walking on grass to get by.Evesham road from finley way to stoke road lights .has been ignored for ages path is half the width it should be.Also this part should be pedestrian and cycle impossible to do
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dunelm The Cloisters, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: A pile of flytipped rubbish dumped outside the garden fence by number 30 Hicks Beach Road GL51 0JW., 7th January
item.description:
This is happening on a regular basis and is getting very annoying!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pheasant Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Potholes along Fairview Road, 7th January
item.description:
Potholes of varying severity along Fairview Road. I don't know how long they've been here but the deeper ones are especially hazardous for people on motorbikes and bikes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 100 Fairview Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on corner of Fairview Road turning onto the Hewlett Road roundabout, 7th January
item.description:
Potentially dangerous pothole at the corner of Fairview Road turning onto the roundabout on Hewlett Road, especially for people on motorbikes and bikes. As I was passing, I saw a cyclist having to swerve to miss it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 159 Fairview Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to road surface going into Tom Price Sloce from Fairview Road, 7th January
item.description:
Surface damage to road leading into Tom Price Close. Don't know how long it has been there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 103 Fairview Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on roundabout on Hewlett Road near St. Anne's Terrace, 7th January
item.description:
In the middle of the roundabout opposite St Anne's Terrace. Not sure how long it has been here. Potentially dangerous for people on motorbikes and bikes due to busyness of the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 93 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes all the way down Duke Street, 7th January
item.description:
Deep potholes down Duke Street. Hazardous especially for people on motorbikes and bikes due to location on the road. Have been here for a while.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 37 Duke Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pothole at the corner of Duke Street joining Hewlett Road, 7th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Duke Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Potholes at the end of Duke Street joining Princes Street, 7th January
item.description:
The damage has been here for some time. The whole of Duke Street is in a bad state of repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Prince's Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Large pothole on Princes Street at junction with Duke Street, 7th January
item.description:
Large pothole a few inches deep that is scattering tarmac across the road. Dangerous for people in cars and bikes. Has been here for some time but getting steadily worse due to the rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Victoria Terrace, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous corner, 7th January
item.description:
Cars park on this corner irresponsibly and it is difficult for buses to pass and cars to see traffic approaching the junction. Yellow lines should be considered as an option to remove this problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 37 Guan Road, Brockworth
